article_title: The Morning Download: Proprietary IT Is Key to R.R. Donnelley Breakup
article_text: Good morning. R.R. Donnelley & Sons, the Chicago-based printing giant, said this morning that it will split itself into three separate companies. Development of proprietary technology, which has focused on areas such as 3-D printing of sensor-embedded labels with a range of potential applications from logistics to secure credit cards, has been a priority for the company.

article_summary:
Donnelley & Sons, the Chicago-based printing giant, said this morning that it will split itself into three separate companies.
Good morning.
Development of proprietary technology, which has focused on areas such as 3-D printing of sensor-embedded labels with a range of potential applications from logistics to secure credit cards, has been a priority for the company.
